data.claim: Bracket B Matchup Patterns for MSJ: (1) Gold accents on dark backgrounds create premium feel without sacrificing readability (2) Serif display fonts (Cormorant Garamond) work well for metrics at large sizes (3) Pill-shaped navigation with subtle border feels more refined than sharp rectangles (4) Red accent works better as highlight than dominant fill for sports apps
data.snippet: Direction D 34/40 vs Direction C 31/40. Key differentiators: hierarchy score (5 vs 4), consistency (5 vs 4), user flow (4 vs 3)
